column1:
RewriteEngine On
 
	RewriteRule ^\.htaccess$ - [F]
 
	RewriteCond %{REQUEST_URI} =""""
	RewriteRule ^.*$ /public/index.php [NC,L]
 
	RewriteCond %{REQUEST_URI} !^/public/.*$
	RewriteRule ^(.*)$ /public/$1
 
	RewriteCond %{REQUEST_FILENAME} -f
	RewriteRule ^.*$ - [NC,L]
 
	RewriteRule ^public/.*$ /public/index.php [NC,L]
